alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 12:46AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Blount and Sevier Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 146 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Smoky Mountains-Twentymile Creek, or 10 miles south of Maryville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Twentymile Creek, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Townsend and Walland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains
